data.text: Sɛdeɛ sikakɔkɔɔ a anka ɛhyerɛn no nie?
Hwɛ sɛdeɛ Sion mmammarima a wɔdi mu
Mpo sakraman yi wɔn nufoɔ
Osukɔm enti, akokoaa tɛkrɛma
Wɔn a na anka wɔdi nnuane pa no
Me nkurɔfoɔ asotwe
Na wɔn ahenemma ho twa sene sukyerɛmma,
Nanso, seesei deɛ, wɔbiri sene wisiapunu;
Wɔn a wɔtotɔ wɔ akofena ano no yɛ koraa
Mmaa a wɔwɔ ayamhyehyeɛ
Awurade ada nʼabufuhyeɛ nyinaa adi;
Asase so ahemfo annye anni,
Nanso ɛsiiɛ, nʼadiyifoɔ no bɔne
Afei wɔkeka wɔ mmɔntene so
Nnipa teateaam gu wɔn so sɛ, “Momfiri ha nkɔ! Mo ho nnte!
Awurade ankasa abɔ wɔn ahwete;
Deɛ ɛka ho bio, yɛn ani anni ammoa yɛn,
Nnipa dii yɛn ntɛntɛ wɔ yɛn anammɔntuo mu,
Yɛn ataafoɔ ho yɛ hare
Deɛ Awurade asra no ngo, yɛn ankasa yɛn nkwa no,
Di ahurisie na ma wʼani nnye, Ao Edom Ɔbabaa,
Ao Ɔbabaa Sion, wʼasotwe bɛba awieeɛ;
